subject: Basketball
Yoga
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Five teammates on the Cornell team that reached the Round of 16 in 2010 are taking yoga classes at the 92nd Street Y. Four of them hope to play basketball professionally overseas.
snippet: Five teammates on the Cornell team that reached the Round of 16 in 2010 are taking yoga classes at the 92nd Street Y. Four of them hope to play basketball professionally overseas.
